term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - sedimentation coefficient, s
term.title: sedimentation coefficient

item.text: Velocity of sedimentation divided by the acceleration of the force field (gravitation or centrifugation).

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 992 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
